content:
What is the MedicationDispense intent search parameter in the CapabilityStatement? This sounds as something that belongs to MedicationRequest, not MedicationDispense.

<extension url="required">
       <valueString value="intent"/>
</extension>
@Corey Spears - I think this question relates to Formulary IG.

There is no MedicationDispense or MedicationRequest in a Formulary workflow. Perhaps the question is about PDex proper. @Mark Scrimshire ?
@Shamil , can you provide a link to what you are referring to?

@Corey Spears
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-epdx/CapabilityStatement-pdex-server.xml.html - and then to the MedicationDispense resource type.
There are multiple:

SHALL patient+intent
SHOULD patient+intent
SHOULD patient+intent
SHALL patient+intent+status

which seem as copy-paste from the US Core MedicationRequest server's CapabilityStatment.
Thanks. This is the PDeX IG that @Mark Scrimshire might be able to assist you with.
